question: Which food aggregator platform has launched a delivery service named ‘INSTAMART’?
explanation:
One of India’s leading Food delivery platforms Swiggy has launched a doorstep delivery service called INSTAMART in Gurugram. It is aimed to deliver essentials and groceries within 45 minutes. 
The Instamart facility is available within the Swiggy app. Swiggy has proposed to make this service available to customers from 7 am to 12 midnight. A wide range of deliverables would be available to the customers. The company has proposed to make this facility available at Bengaluru shortly.
